Get GNRL data
SCR2442 validation existing investigations
Only need to check and use the first IDCR meeting the
criteria, therefore end task yes after. Would have used a link but
need to check for datdecision is null

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(a.INVO_AACTUALH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO a inner join :1/INVA b on b.INVA_NO = a.INVO_NO and b.INVA_CURRENCY = ':2' left outer join :1/MARK c on a.INVO_MARKCODESPEC = c.MARK_CODE left outer join :1/MARK d on a.INVO_MARKCODETEXT = d.MARK_CODE Where a.INVO_ADMNO = :3 and a.INVO_CLNTNO = :4 and a.INVO_DEBH_NO = :5 and ( a.INVO_DATSTARTDELCREDEREINVST < ':6' and b.INVA_ACTADISPUTES =0 and b.INVA_ACTAFACTORING > 0 AND ( a.INVO_MARKCODESPEC = 0 or c.MARK_DELCREDEREINVESTIGATION = 'Y' ) and ( a.INVO_MARKCODETEXT = 0 or d.MARK_DELCREDEREINVESTIGATION = 'Y' ) or INVO_AACTUALI<0 ) and not exists (select * from :1/MQDT e where e.MQDT_MQTY_ID = 62 and e.MQDT_DEBC_NO = a.INVO_DEBC_NO) for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAH) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/DEBB inner join :1/DEBC on DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and DEBC_ADMNO= :2 and DEBC_CLNTNO = :3 and DEBC_DEBH = :4 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
